banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: How we use a shipping container to spark scientific curiosity
videoData.socialTitle: How we use a shipping container to spark scientific curiosity

nodes.whoTheyAre: With a background in social work and education, Daniel Sherling has always been passionate about increasing children’s access to high-quality education. In his current role as a Senior Global Manager for Corporate Responsibility at Merck KGaA, Darmstadt, Germany, Sherling oversees employee and community engagement and corporate philanthropy programs related to education.

videoData.description: "How can students get excited about science if they don't have access to the resources?" asks science education promoter Daniel Sherling. Answer? Bring the fun science to schools — with a mobile science lab meant to encourage engaged, dynamic learning! Sherling explains how he, his team and a bright yellow shipping container tour North America with a single goal: to spark curiosity in the next generation of scientists.
videoData.socialDescription: "How can students get excited about science if they don't have access to the resources?" asks science education promoter Daniel Sherling. Answer? Bring the fun science to schools — with a mobile science lab meant to encourage engaged, dynamic learning!
